title: New: Maria Kelly – Threads Feat. Ailbhe Reddy
content:
This is gorgeous.

Maria Kelly teams up with Ailbhe Reddy on her first new material of the year, in the form of the heartbreakingly beautiful Threads. There’s a real emotional rawness to the songwriting; it almost feels like spilling your heart onto paper in the minutes after a heated argument with a loved one – that loss and pointlessness of the whole situation, summarised succinctly in the closing line, ‘you make it difficult to be around you‘. Check it out below.
